item.title: Lea add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Shit is the tofu of cursing and can be molded to whichever condition the speaker desires. Hot as shit. Windy as shit. I myself was confounded as shit..." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lea add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Lea add a quote by Gustave Flaubert (1821-1880)
item.description: "The deplorable mania of doubt exhausts me. I doubt about everything, even my doubts. " -- Gustave Flaubert (1821-1880)

item.title: Lea add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Lea add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "I love being a writer. What I can't stand is the paperwork." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: Lea add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "People say graffiti is ugly, irresponsible and childish... but that's only if it's done properly." -- Banksy

item.title: Lea add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "Let others pride themselves about how many pages they have written; I'd rather boast about the ones I've read." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Lea add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Lea add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "When you give up struggle, there's a kind of love. " -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Lea add a quote by Margaret Wise Brown
item.description: "Goodnight stars, goodnight air, goodnight noises everywhere." -- Margaret Wise Brown

item.title: Lea add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I love things made out of animals. It's just so funny to think of someone saying, "I need a letter opener. I guess I'll have to kill a deer." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lea add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "You write in order to change the world ... if you alter, even by a millimeter, the way people look at reality, then you can change it." -- James Baldwin
